itemDescription: British Sinologist who served as Consul-General for H.B.M in China and Korea

wikipedia_page.main: Sir William Henry Wilkinson (traditional Chinese: 務謹順, simplified Chinese: 务谨顺; May 10, 1858 - 1930) was a British Sinologist who served as Consul-General for the United Kingdom in China and Korea. He was also a playing card collector and card game enthusiast.
